actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the period for making tax-free rollovers of certain distributions from qualified plans from 60 to 90 days.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the period for making tax-free rollovers of certain distributions from employee benefit plans from 60 days to 90 days.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the period for making tax-free rollovers of certain distributions from qualified plans from 60 to 90 days.
